sources.title: And Same To You
sources.description: Title: And the Same to You Year: 1960 Length: 70 min Genre: Comedy Summary: Stuck with the name "Dickie Dreadnought," Rix feels he has no choice but to pursue a career as a boxer. To mollify his uncle, Rix pretends to be the soul of religiosity, while his ... Release Date: February 1960 (UK) Content Rating: NotRated Directed by: George Pollock Actors: Brian Rix, William Hartnell, Tommy Cooper Production Company: Monarch Productions Limited Sound Mix: Mono Color: Black and White Stuck with the name "Dickie Dreadnought," Rix feels he has no choice but to pursue a career as a boxer. To mollify his uncle, Rix pretends to be the soul of religiosity, while his tough-talking manager William Hartnell poses as a Man of the Cloth. Enter the URL of the movie.

metadata.Plot: Stuck with the name "Dickie Dreadnought," Rix feels he has no choice but to pursue a career as a boxer. To mollify his uncle, Rix pretends to be the soul of religiosity, while his tough-talking manager William Hartnell poses as a Man of the Cloth.
metadata.Writer: John Paddy Carstairs, A.P. Dearsley, John Junkin
metadata.Actors: Brian Rix, William Hartnell, Tommy Cooper
